description:
Hayate cannot bring himself to return to the Sanzenin mansion after he damages the cashmere coat that Maria lent him. While contemplating on what to do, he meets the "generous" people who tried to take him away and ends up fighting them all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toki ga Mieru to Kimi wa Iu Kedo, Tabun Sore wa Soumatou
You Said You Can See Time, But That`s Probably Your Life Flashing By
時が見えると君は言うけど, たぶんそれは走馬灯
